name: spaghettini

pasta made in the form of long, very thin strings that are thinner than spaghetti: We had stuffed calamari followed by spaghettini with a tasty anchovy sauce. I used spaghettini, but linguine or spaghetti also work well.
More examplesFewer examplesCook the spaghettini in boiling salted water according to the cooking instructions, then drain in a colander.Allow 300g spaghettini if you are serving the dish as a starter, or 500g for a main course. There's a recipe for spaghettini salad with prawns.
